title: Suspect Is Accused Of Smuggling Aliens
body:
A man described as a major figure in the smuggling of illegal Chinese immigrants into the United States has been 
arrested in New York, Federal officials said yesterday.

They said that the arrest of the man, Chen Guo Ping, who was taken into custody Friday, was a significant step in 
combating the problem of alien-smuggling from China.

While there have been many arrests of lower-level smugglers and of gang members who hold the smuggled aliens 
captive in the United States until they can pay money they owe smugglers, arrests of high-level organizers have 
been rare.
